CustomField.description: Company Base ID of the base product line this add on product line is related to and will be null for base product lines. Once base product is processed, the related add ons by Parent ID will be processed.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Company Base ID of the base product line this add on product line is related to and will be null for base product lines. Once base product is processed, the related add ons by Parent ID will be processed.
CustomField.label: Parent ID
